Themes

  • {{theme.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from 'src/app/service/theme.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-bar', templateUrl: './side-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-bar.component.css'] }) export class SideBarComponent implements OnInit { isLoading = false; hasError = false data :any; constructor(private themeService: ThemeService ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.themeService.getThemeData().subscribe( (res:any) => this.data = res.results, ) } }
